name: escape from death (itch)
description:
Game represents brainstorming, both physical and moral.
The plot is developed from the fact that the servant of The Lord, Markus, comes to the cemetery with news: what prepares to indulge raid at the cemetery to revenge to him, for the stolen souls. At that time the Lord sends Markus for protection of the cemetery. Having taken a purple bullet-proof vest, Markus begins the movement.
